1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj Asaf.</e> <pb/><t>Ayton val svach'c'olal Dios d'ayon̈ a on̈ israel on̈ tic, mach on̈ tojol yaj co pensar.</t>
2: <t>Ixocto val yac' jab'ocxo, in telvi. Jab'xon̈ej maj in b'atcan d'a scal chucal,</t>
3: <t>yujto ix viloch in c'ol d'a eb' ac'umtac yed' eb' anima chuc ayic ix vilani to te vach'n̈ej yaj eb'.</t>
4: <t>Malaj chamel sja d'a yib'an̈ eb' svila'. Tec'an yaj eb', malaj syab' syail snivanil eb'.</t>
5: <t>Malaj yaelal sja d'a yib'an̈ eb'. Malaj stzapan majanil eb' sja d'a yib'an̈.</t>
6: <t>Yuj chi' te vach' syutej eb' sb'oan sb'a yuj sch'oxanel yac'umtaquil yed' pax yixtan anima.</t>
7: <t>Ijan val maxtzac checlaj yol sat eb' yuj sb'aq'uechal. Yelxo val te chuc spensar eb'.</t>
8: <t>B'uchumtac slolon eb', syic'chaan̈ sb'a eb'. Malaj jab'oc sq'uixvelal eb' yac'an oval, syixtan anima eb'.</t>
9: <t>An̈ej b'uchval lolonel syal eb' d'a Dios aj satchaan̈. Syalanpax chuc eb' d'a anima d'a sat luum tic.</t>
10: <t>Yuj chi' tz'och tzac'an eb' anima yuj eb', schaan yab' eb' anima chi' jantac chucal syal eb'.</t>
11: <t>Snaan eb' icha tic: ¿Tas ol yutoc Dios Ec'to d'a yib'an̈ smasanil yojtacanel tas sco c'ulej tic? ¿Tocval syil tas tzuji tic? xchi eb'.</t>
12: <t>Ilecnab' val juntzan̈ anima chuc tic, malaj tas tz'ic'an eb', ste q'uib'n̈ej chaan̈ sb'eyumal eb'.</t>
13: <t>Palta a inxo tic, malaj tas ix vac' ganar vach'chom ix in yamoch vaan in pensar d'a chucal, vach'chom vach' ix vutej in b'eyb'al.</t>
14: <t>Cotac scal tz'ac'ji in yaelal, ichato tzin mac'ji. Junjun q'uin̈ib'alil svic'an tz'uum.</t>
15: <t>Mamin, q'uinaloc ix val icha syal eb' chi', ix am vixtej eb' vetchon̈ab', a on̈ ton a chon̈ab' on̈ tic.</t>
16: <t>Ix snib'ej in c'ool to snachajel jun tic vuuj, palta ton̈ej ix somchaj in pensar yuuj.</t>
17: <t>Ato val yic ix in och d'a a cajnub', ichato chi' ix nachajel vuuj tas ol cotcan d'a yib'an̈ eb' chuc chi'.</t>
18: <t>Toxo ix aq'uem lin̈an eb' d'a yax n̈elec'tac yic stelvi eb'. Tzecancanb'at eb' b'aj ol ixtaxoc.</t>
19: <t>Elan̈chamel ol aj satel eb'. D'a scal xivc'olal ol lajvoccanel eb'.</t>
20: <t>Ach Mamin Vajalil, icha tz'aj sat svayich junoc mach d'a sc'ool ayic tz'el svayan̈, icha chi' ol aj a paticanel eb' chuc chi' ayic ol a naanq'ue tas ol aj eb'.</t>
21: <t>Ayic manto nachajel-laj jun tic vuuj, ix in te cusi, ix och pitz'an syail d'a in pixan.</t>
22: <t>A yuj in quistalil maj nachajel-laj vuuj, yuj chi' lajan ix vutej in b'a d'a ichan̈ icha junoc noc' noc' malaj spensar.</t>
23: <t>Palta jun, ayinn̈ej ec' ed'oc, quetzb'il in uuj.</t>
24: <t>Tzin a c'ayb'an d'a tas svutej in b'a. Axo d'a slajvub', ol in a cha d'a a vach'ilal.</t>
25: <t>Malaj junocxo mach ayec' d'a satchaan̈ b'aj svac'och in pensar, a achn̈ej toni. Ayic snachajel vuuj to ayach ec' ved'oc, man̈xalaj tas tzin nib'ejoch d'a sat luum tic.</t>
26: <t>Vach'chom spax yip in nivanil tic, stacpax in c'ool, palta a achxo ach Dios, Vipumal aji, an̈ej d'ayach ay masanil tas snib'ej in c'ool.</t>
27: <t>A eb' syiq'uel sb'a d'ayach, ol cham eb'. Ol a satel masanil eb' syiq'uel sb'a chi'.</t>
28: <t>Palta a in val tic Mamin Jehová Vajalil, tzin nitzoch in b'a d'a a tz'ey yujto an̈ej jun chi' nivan yelc'och d'ayin. Tzach vac'och yipoc in c'ool yic svalel jantac tas ix a c'ulej.</t>
